- Able to learn and provide solutions to most any challenge I encounter Experience Director, IT Network and Infrastructure California Dental Association February 2004  – Present (11 years 7 months) Responsible for managing the IT Operations team. This team provides all design, maintenance, and support for the entire IT infrastructure including the building-specific network infrastructure, the data center, telecommunications (VoIP and cellular), security, and audiovisual environments as well as general help desk tasks. Responsibilities also include forecasting and maintenance of the capital and operating IT budget.  
 
The California Dental Association is a diverse organization that includes an insurance company, an insurance brokerage, a philanthropic foundation, and a property management company for the CDA-owned high-rise in downtown Sacramento. 
 
My team and I have: 
• Relocated a data center of more than 150 servers without production downtime for our users. 
• Upgraded our core networking technologies to support newer technologies. 
• Migrated an antiquated phone system to a state-of-the-art VoIP system, including three call centers. 
• Enabled the organization to reduce travel expenses by implementing virtual meeting solutions. 
• Significantly reduced costs and added features for our annual meetings by taking ownership of the technology in use. 
• Reduced technology-related costs by renegotiating maintenance and service contracts, migrating from older technology, enabling virtualization, enhancing remote access, and providing a mechanism for the re-sale of our retired equipment. 
• Designed a comprehensive disaster recovery solution to support the organization’s business continuity plan. Summary Jabin Trapp is an Information Technology Manager with immediate experience working as a full time network engineer for Wells Fargo Bank. He provides expertise in several areas of networking design including enterprise network architecture, high speed/bandwidth network engineering, network firewall, network security, network vulnerability, enterprise wireless design, enterprise wireless security, and campus facilities support. 
 
Jabin has twenty four years of experience in Information Technology (IT) and specialized technology, including fifteen years in high bandwidth network design supporting CADD graphical applications, high bandwidth compute servers and super-computing clusters, Fifteen years in data center and facilities operations, twelve years of network routing and switching engineering, ten years of direct report management experience, ten years of network diagramming and documentation, eight years of large IT project management experience, eight years of enterprise class wireless networking, also five years of network security and firewall experience.
